alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Franklin; Gulf; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 2:41AM EDT until April 18 at 3:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Eastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 345 AM EDT/245 AM CDT/. * At 240 AM EDT/140 AM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 18 miles west of Blountstown to 9 miles northeast of Tyndall Air Force Base to 20 miles west of Mexico Beach, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Blountstown, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Franklin, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Clarksville, Allanton, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff and St George Island St Pk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bay; Calhoun; Franklin; Gulf; Liberty; Wakulla
